  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Mobile Engineer",
  "description": "Jaza is a solar energy start-up working to power Sub-Saharan Africa. We build solar-powered shops which charge batteries customers use to power their homes. In 2022, we achieved over 1.5 million battery swaps, providing approximately 186,000 people access to clean, affordable energy. We employ women from each community (known as Jaza Stars) to run the service, empowering our team to become leaders, entrepreneurs and drivers of economic growth within their communities. We&rsquo;ve already successfully entered the Nigerian market, piloted several sites here and will grow to hundreds of locations over the next year. To support this expansion, we&rsquo;re planning to hire over 200 people over the next 6 months.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Mobile Engineer
Job Location:&nbsp;&nbsp;Lagos

Position Overview


	We&#39;re seeking an experienced Full Stack Software Engineer (Mobile) to join our team and contribute to the development and maintenance of Jaza mobile applications.
	You&#39;ll work on production applications built with cutting-edge Android technologies, following clean architecture principles and industry best practices.
	This role emphasizes mobile development while providing opportunities to collaborate with backend teams and contribute to full-stack solutions.


Requirements


	3+ years of Android development experience&nbsp;with production apps on Google Play Store
	Strong Kotlin proficiency&nbsp;- Modern Kotlin features, coroutines, and Flow
	Jetpack Compose&nbsp;- Building declarative UIs with Compose
	Clean Architecture &amp; MVVM&nbsp;- Multi-layer architecture, separation of concerns
	Dependency Injection&nbsp;- Hilt or Dagger experience
	Room Database&nbsp;- Local data persistence, complex queries, migrations
	Retrofit &amp; RESTful APIs&nbsp;- Network layer implementation, API integration
	Asynchronous Programming&nbsp;- Coroutines, Flow, StateFlow, suspend functions
	Version Control&nbsp;- Git, branching strategies, pull requests
	Gradle&nbsp;- Build configuration, dependency management, build variants.


Experience Areas:


	Building feature-rich Android applications with multiple modules
	Offline-first architectures&nbsp;- Local-first data with background synchronization
	Working with complex data models and database migrations
	Webhook-based data synchronization&nbsp;- Queue management and retry logic
	Implementing real-time data synchronization and background workers
	Firebase integration (Analytics, Cloud Messaging, Crashlytics)
	Material Design principles and UI/UX implementation
	App bundle generation and Play Store deployment
	Performance optimization and memory management.


Soft Skills:


	Strong problem-solving abilities and analytical thinking
	Excellent communication skills for technical discussions
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	Detail-oriented with focus on code quality
	Proactive approach to identifying and resolving issues
	Time management and ability to meet deadlines


Nice to Have:


	Experience with business/inventory management applications
	Background in energy sector or IoT device management apps
	Kotlin Multiplatform (KMP)&nbsp;- Experience with shared code across Android, iOS, and other platforms
	Familiarity with Laravel backend&nbsp;- Understanding of RESTful API integration with Laravel applications
	Basic knowledge of backend technologies&nbsp;- Laravel, PHP, PostgreSQL, RabbitMQ, Redis, API design patterns
	Jetpack Navigation Compose expertise
	WorkManager for background tasks
	Custom Compose animations and transitions
	CI/CD pipeline experience (GitHub Actions, Bitrise, etc.)
	Automated testing experience (JUnit, Espresso, Compose UI tests)
	Experience with multi-environment builds (staging/production)
	Familiarity with DataStore for preferences
	Knowledge of app security best practices
	Play Store optimization and ASO experience.


Tech Stack You&#39;ll Work With
Languages &amp; Frameworks:


	Kotlin
	Jetpack Compose
	Coroutines &amp; Flow.


Architecture &amp; Patterns:


	Clean Architecture (multi-layer)
	MVVM Pattern
	Repository Pattern
	Use Cases / Interactors.


Libraries &amp; Tools:


	Hilt (Dependency Injection)
	Room (Database)
	Retrofit (Networking)
	Jetpack Navigation
	DataStore (Preferences)
	Firebase (Analytics, FCM)
	WorkManager (Background tasks)
	Gradle (Build system).


Testing:


	JUnit
	Truth
	Turbine
	Mockito
	Robolectric.

Mobile Engineer Job at Jaza Energy




        
    

        
        Jaza is a solar energy start-up working to power Sub-Saharan Africa. We build solar-powered shops which charge batteries customers use to power their homes. In 2022, we achieved over 1.5 million battery swaps, providing approximately 186,000 people access to clean, affordable energy. We employ women from each community (known as Jaza Stars) to run the service, empowering our team to become leaders, entrepreneurs and drivers of economic growth within their communities. We’ve already successfully entered the Nigerian market, piloted several sites here and will grow to hundreds of locations over the next year. To support this expansion, we’re planning to hire over 200 people over the next 6 months.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:
     

            
    



Job Position: Mobile Engineer
Job Location:  Lagos

Position Overview


	We're seeking an experienced Full Stack Software Engineer (Mobile) to join our team and contribute to the development and maintenance of Jaza mobile applications.
	You'll work on production applications built with cutting-edge Android technologies, following clean architecture principles and industry best practices.
	This role emphasizes mobile development while providing opportunities to collaborate with backend teams and contribute to full-stack solutions.


Requirements


	3+ years of Android development experience with production apps on Google Play Store
	Strong Kotlin proficiency - Modern Kotlin features, coroutines, and Flow
	Jetpack Compose - Building declarative UIs with Compose
	Clean Architecture & MVVM - Multi-layer architecture, separation of concerns
	Dependency Injection - Hilt or Dagger experience
	Room Database - Local data persistence, complex queries, migrations
	Retrofit & RESTful APIs - Network layer implementation, API integration
	Asynchronous Programming - Coroutines, Flow, StateFlow, suspend functions
	Version Control - Git, branching strategies, pull requests
	Gradle - Build configuration, dependency management, build variants.


Experience Areas:


	Building feature-rich Android applications with multiple modules
	Offline-first architectures - Local-first data with background synchronization
	Working with complex data models and database migrations
	Webhook-based data synchronization - Queue management and retry logic
	Implementing real-time data synchronization and background workers
	Firebase integration (Analytics, Cloud Messaging, Crashlytics)
	Material Design principles and UI/UX implementation
	App bundle generation and Play Store deployment
	Performance optimization and memory management.


Soft Skills:


	Strong problem-solving abilities and analytical thinking
	Excellent communication skills for technical discussions
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	Detail-oriented with focus on code quality
	Proactive approach to identifying and resolving issues
	Time management and ability to meet deadlines


Nice to Have:


	Experience with business/inventory management applications
	Background in energy sector or IoT device management apps
	Kotlin Multiplatform (KMP) - Experience with shared code across Android, iOS, and other platforms
	Familiarity with Laravel backend - Understanding of RESTful API integration with Laravel applications
	Basic knowledge of backend technologies - Laravel, PHP, PostgreSQL, RabbitMQ, Redis, API design patterns
	Jetpack Navigation Compose expertise
	WorkManager for background tasks
	Custom Compose animations and transitions
	CI/CD pipeline experience (GitHub Actions, Bitrise, etc.)
	Automated testing experience (JUnit, Espresso, Compose UI tests)
	Experience with multi-environment builds (staging/production)
	Familiarity with DataStore for preferences
	Knowledge of app security best practices
	Play Store optimization and ASO experience.


Tech Stack You'll Work With
Languages & Frameworks:


	Kotlin
	Jetpack Compose
	Coroutines & Flow.


Architecture & Patterns:


	Clean Architecture (multi-layer)
	MVVM Pattern
	Repository Pattern
	Use Cases / Interactors.


Libraries & Tools:


	Hilt (Dependency Injection)
	Room (Database)
	Retrofit (Networking)
	Jetpack Navigation
	DataStore (Preferences)
	Firebase (Analytics, FCM)
	WorkManager (Background tasks)
	Gradle (Build system).


Testing:


	JUnit
	Truth
	Turbine
	Mockito
	Robolectric.

General Manager - Interstate Passenger Transport Job at Vodstra Limited




        
    

        
        Vodstra Limited - Our client, a major interstate passenger transport operator in Nigeria, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: General Manager - Interstate Passenger Transport (Nigeria 

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	Our client is seeking a strong industry leader to take full operational and commercial control of the business.
	We are specifically targeting professionals who have already run large-scale operations at the highest level in Nigeria’s passenger transport sector.


Who This Role Is For
This position is strictly for candidates who have:


	Served as Head of Operations (or equivalent) in one of Nigeria’s top six interstate passenger transport companies
	Managed large fleets, multiple terminals, interstate routes, and thousands of daily passengers
	Led operations in high-pressure, regulator-heavy, margin-sensitive environments
	If you have not operated at this level, do not apply.


As General Manager, you will be accountable for:


	End-to-end control of nationwide interstate operations
	Fleet performance, route profitability, safety compliance, and service reliability
	Turning operational discipline into measurable revenue growth
	Eliminating inefficiencies, revenue leakages, and underperformance
	Leading senior management teams and holding them to clear KPIs
	Managing regulators, unions, security agencies, and strategic partners
	Scaling operations while maintaining strict cost and safety controls


Requirements


	Prior role as Head of Operations (or equivalent) within one of Nigeria’s top six interstate passenger transport companies
	10–15+ years of progressive leadership experience in large-scale passenger transport operations
	Proven success in managing multi-location, high-volume interstate transport operations
	Deep, practical knowledge of Nigerian transport regulations and operating realities
	Strong financial discipline and commercial judgment
	Data-driven, decisive, and execution-focused
	Experienced in change management, turnaround, or rapid scale-up
	Direct exposure to operating under board oversight and investor performance expectations
	Willingness to travel extensively and take full ownership of results.


What We Offer


	Executive-level compensation aligned with performance
	Authority to make real decisions and implement change
	A platform to leave a visible, measurable impact on a national transport operation.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: info@vodstra.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
